title: "Healthcare Workers Deserve Better: Can Artificial Intelligence Help?"
excerpt: "Healthcare organizations can alleviate burnout and enhance working conditions by incorporating AI-based technology in EHR. This way, the huge amount of clinical data available can be obtained in real time from medical devices and records. And the vast amount of data can be quickly and efficiently analyzed and optimally used."
